text: Roos Johannes Christian Roos (28 April 1826 in Kamp am Rhein – 22 October 1896 in Freiburg im Breisgau) was a German Roman Catholic clergyman. He was Bishop of Limburg from 1885 to 1886 and Archbishop of Freiburg from 1886 until his death ten years later. == Bibliography (in German) == * Klaus Schatz: Geschichte des Bistums Limburg. Mainz 1983. * Christoph Schmider: Die Freiburger Bischöfe: 175 Jahre Erzbistum Freiburg. Eine Geschichte in Lebensbildern. Freiburg i. Br.: Herder Verlag, 2002. . ==Sources== * Category:Bishops of Limburg Category:Archbishops of Freiburg Category:1896 deaths Category:1826 births Category:People from Rhein-Lahn-Kreis
title: Christian Roos
